sentences.en: Any direct and necessary expenses incurred by the executor and administrator.
sentences.cn: 一一执行遗嘱及管理遗产之直接必要费用.

sentences.en: Executor should find caution for his due administration of the estate in his charge.
sentences.cn: 指定的遗嘱执行人应为处于自己掌管下的财产提供但保.

sentences.en: Executor, Zeratul shall find us passage to the warp gate.
sentences.cn: 执行长, 泽拉图会杀出一条通往传送门的血路.

sentences.en: He was named executor of his brother's will.
sentences.cn: 他被提名做他兄弟的遗嘱执行人.

sentences.en: I know who the executor is.
sentences.cn: 我知道谁是遗嘱执行人.

sentences.en: Irrigated area is building of engineering irrigation, executor that water resource allocate.
sentences.cn: 灌区既是灌溉工程的建筑物, 又是水资源调配的执行者.

sentences.en: Life comes first; the poet is the executor of life.
sentences.cn: 先有行为; 诗人是人生的实行者.

sentences.en: Other aspects of the Humphrey's Executor reasoning, however, have been roundly criticized in subsequent years.
sentences.cn: 但是, “汉弗莱的遗嘱执行人”案的其他方面的论证在随后的若干年受到严厉的批评.

sentences.en: The amygdala is an executor of stress behavioral, autonomic and neuroendocrine responses.
sentences.cn: 杏仁核是应激性行为反应以及自主神经和神经内分泌反应的执行部位.

sentences.en: The executor read it out loud.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱执行人把这段大声朗读了出来.

sentences.en: The executor shared out the estate.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱执行人把遗产分给每个人.

sentences.en: The executor tried to comply with the intent of the testator.
sentences.cn: 执行人尽量遵照立遗嘱之人的意图.

sentences.en: There is no business of any executor or tax collector in the future.
sentences.cn: 将来的一切都用不着遗嘱执行人和税收人过问了.

sentences.en: You don’t have to be the executor of the full idea, but as a problem solver, you have some responsibility for implementing the solution.
sentences.cn: 你不需要是整个计划的执行者，但作为一个解决问题者，你对整个方案的执行仍负有一定的责任。

sentences.en: You must present your demands to the executor.
sentences.cn: 你必须将你的要求告诉遗嘱执行人.
泽拉图: 阿尔达瑞斯是对的, 执行长.

words.tran_cn: 行政的；经营的；执行的，经营管理的
经理；执行委员会；执行者；经理主管人员

trans.tran_cn: 执行者，实行者，遗嘱执行人
trans.tran_en: someone who deals with the instructions in someone’s will
